channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report X-2024040022
item.description:
Report X-2024040022

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-04T15:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-26
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO, CLEANED UP, AND TRANSPORTED TO DMP. UPON INSPECTION IN THE DMP IT WAS FOUND THAT THE CAPS OF 3 OUT OF 4 1 GALLON BOTTLES WERE LOOSE AND THE CONTAINERS LEAKED. THE 4TH BOTTLE WAS NOT LEAKING BUT THE LABEL AND BOTTLE WERE SOILED AND WET FROM THE OTHER LEAKERS.

item.title: Report E-2024040053
item.description:
Report E-2024040053

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-04T15:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-05
  • City: MENOMONEE FALLS
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A Veolia employee was unloading the IBCs from a trailer at Veolia's ten day intransit facility and noticed that six out of the twelve bags had leaked inside the trailer. The waste was F039 filter cake that should have been all solid but instead had residual liquid left over from the process. Over time, the liquid settled out and leaked from the package. The liquid that leaked was absorbed with oil dry and the material was repacked before being shipped to the disposal facility.

item.title: Report X-2024031394
item.description:
Report X-2024031394

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-26
  • City: LA CROSSE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Bucket containing UN1760 started leaking from bottom of drum due to small crack that formed in the center. DescribePack: Crack formed on bottom of drum in the center, crack is less than 1 millimeter DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA used PPE to put leaking bucket in hazmat bin and put down ANPHOMAG Universal spill neutralizer on released liquid.

item.title: Report X-2024031274
item.description:
Report X-2024031274

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-21
  • City: EAU CLAIRE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was inbound scanned at 06:30. By 06:34 package arrived in primary sort tower. Individual in primary sort tower communicated that a hazmat had been sent up, and that box had a strong smell to it. Upon inspection liquid was found within containment bag. DescribePack: Unable to determine exact size of opening, but damage was done to top rim of metal container, resulting in leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Tip package upright, liquid was leaking out of top.

item.description:
Report X-2024031390

  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was found on a QA cart leaking. Box was placed in a bin with a plastic liner to contain spillage. DescribePack: One of four 4L bottles had a loose cap and spilled contents into package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a bin with a plastic liner to contain the spillage.
